casebody.data:
HARGROVE
v.
BATTS & INSURANCE. No. 480P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. Amanda M. Willis, Greensboro, for Batt Temp. Service, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of December 2003 by Plaintiff for Reconsideration on Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2004."
